webwork-tex.statement: \par Let \(\bf F\) be the radial force field \(\mathbf{F} = x\mathbf i + y\mathbf j\). Find the work done by this force along the following two curves, both which go from (0, 0) to (10, 100). (Compare your answers!) \par A. If \(C_1\) is the parabola: \(x = t, \ y = t^2, \ 0 \leq t \leq 10\), then \(\displaystyle \int_{C_1} \mathbf{F} \cdot \, d\mathbf{r} =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{15ex}{\hrulefill}} \par B. If \(C_2\) is the straight line segment: \(x = 10 t^2, \ y = 100 t^2, \ 0 \leq t \leq 1\), then \(\displaystyle \int_{C_2} \mathbf F \cdot \, d\mathbf{r} =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{15ex}{\hrulefill}}
